name: Devon Day Ranger
description:
DEVON DAY RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day throughout Devon from St.Budeaux Ferry Road west of Plymouth to Tiverton Parkway and Axminster in the east 
      plus the five Devon branch lines to Gunnislake, Paignton, Exmouth, Barnstaple and Okehampton. It allows travel along the Great Western Main Line from Tiverton Parkway to Plymouth through Exeter St.Davids, Newton Abbot and Totnes and includes the English Riviera seaside 
      towns of Torquay and Paignton. You can visit the South Devon Railway at Totnes, the Dartmouth Steam Railway & Riverboat Company at Paignton and the Plym Valley Railway near Plymouth.
